sn29.4:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn29.4:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce jalābujā nāgā uposathaṃ upavasanti vossaṭṭhakāyā ca bhavantī”ti?
sn29.4:1.5: “Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena m’idhekacce jalābujā nāgā uposathaṃ upavasanti vossaṭṭhakāyā ca bhavantī”ti.
